name: TransferFromNonAcuteHospital
title: Transfer From Non Acute Hospital
description: Transfer group Non Acute Hospital for Yale Measure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping value set contains environment/locations used to identify patients transferred to/from a Non-Acute Care Hospital prior to admission to current hospital.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of the value set is to identify a transfer to/from a non-acute care hospital. The QDM Category linked to this value set: Transfer of Care),(Inclusion Criteria: Include SNOMED CT codes indicating a non-acute care hospital environment or geographic location.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
